snippet: Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu, PricewaterhouseCoopers, Ernst & Young and KPMG will have to hire Chinese citizens under new rules set by China’s Finance Ministry.
abstract: Ernst & Young and PricewaterhouseCoopers, two of the biggest global auditing firms, will accept new directive from China's Ministry of Finance to staff their local operations with Chinese citizens.
lead_paragraph: Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu, PricewaterhouseCoopers, Ernst & Young and KPMG will have to hire Chinese citizens under new rules set by China’s Finance Ministry.

headline.seo: 2 Auditing Firms Accept Chinese Rule on Employing Citizens
headline.main: China Issues New Rules to Foreign Auditing Firms
headline.print_headline: 2 Auditing Firms Accept Chinese Rule on Employing Citizens
